channel.title: Folllowed every step on getting an server up but still getting error please help
channel.description: I've followed all of the steps in the tutorial but when I go to login to the server with my no-ip.biz it says error connecting to server. Please help.

item.title: Folllowed every step on getting an server up but still getting error please help
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Reaper1 Soul_Reaper
item.description:
@Soul_Reaper1 wrote:

since ur the one hosting u cant use ur own no-ip to log in
u gotta use a local host like 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0.
Also keep ur no-ip on that allows other people to join ur server.

Read full topic
item.source: Folllowed every step on getting an server up but still getting error please help

item.title: Folllowed every step on getting an server up but still getting error please help

item.description:
@BigMack100 wrote:

I do have an No-IP.

Read full topic
item.source: Folllowed every step on getting an server up but still getting error please help

item.title: Folllowed every step on getting an server up but still getting error please help
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

If you use localhost, your ip address, blank ip, etc it won’t let anyone else connect unless they type in your specific ip address. it’s better to figure out a no-ip name if you want other people on your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Folllowed every step on getting an server up but still getting error please help
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Your not supposed to log into your server with your no-ip address. Your supposed to use blank ip or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
